name: Liero3D
description:
Liero3D is a remake of the classic DOS-era artillery shooter game Liero.

Load up your Super Shotgun, Chiquita Bombs and Big Nukes, grab your ninja rope and get ready for mayhem!

  • Fully destructible 3D world
  • An arsenal of weapons based on the original Liero
  • Weapon and medic crate drops
  • Swing through the arena using your trusty ninja rope
  • Network multiplayer
  • Modding support

NOTE: This game is an early prototype. It is already fun to play, but lacks many features outside the core gameplay. It is not guaranteed to be bug free.

Instructions

With the LieroLauncher open, first start the server, and then the client.

Other players on the same network can join by entering the IP address which appears after starting the server, and then starting the client.

By forwarding port 2500 through your router, other players can join a game by connecting to your external IP.
